title: 500+ ping when net is running fine.
body:
Is it only me or is it the servers, my internet is clearly fine, pinging google and everything, but I am still managing to get 500-2k ping?
6mbps download speed 1mbps upload, no one is on the net and I have LoL excluded from all security scans.

replies.body:
Strange. There aren't any server issues at the moment, so it can't be that. How long have you been experiencing this for? Since the time that patch 4.21 came out?

And what OS are you using? Who's your ISP? Information helps sort out these issues.
Not sure when it happened, probably 4-5 patches ago. Telstra atm but converting to Iinet.
Hm... Telstra is probably one of the best ones atm. You mainly want to watch out for TPG and Optus, though sometimes you just need to tweak a setting to fix those.
